ygData.subject: Re: I dont know why u play a wizard, but...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... So basically what you are saying is I don t have a problem so you shouldn t too and you re just whiners , right? Listen up, bucko. If you don t have a
ygData.messageBody:
SuperFreak wrote:
>
> From: SuperFreak <supermario@...>
>
> I dont know why you guys play a Wizard, but I know why I do, thats the
> fascinationg with spells, the sheer ability to shoot with so much dmg
> per shot, i like that. In UO, i had alot of magery, i liked there spells
> better than the Wizard in here cuz they could do all sorts of fun stuff,
> like conjure 2 animals and make them fight(great fun with eles :P) and
> all kinds of stuff. But I like a wizard, and I for one think they are
> just fine. If you got a problem with a wizard, I think you should play
> another class, not whine about it.
>

So basically what you are saying is "I don't have a problem so you
shouldn't too and you're just whiners", right?

Listen up, bucko. If you don't have a problem, then go play some more
and stop clogging the list with useless posts like that. It's obvious
that most people here DO have problems and we have decided to do
something about them. Your little stories about UO are fascinating, I'm
sure, but off topic for the list, and the topic.

More specifically, no one cares about what your opinion is. The problems
we are talking about have been noticed by many many people (all whiners,
by your logic) and do not stem out of selfish ambition and power
hungriness. They are not personal problems (or the lack of thereof) but
universal wizard problems.

Get it?

Here, I'll make it simple - it's like if your town was being bombed and
your house didn't get hit and you'd go and talk about how all these
homeless people are just whiners and tell them stories about your life
in another town.

HTH, HAND.

--
Qenelin
